metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21775 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the way certain events areprocessed for ImageLoader objects of Webkit WebKitGTK 2.30.4. A speciallycrafted web page can lead to a potential information leak and furthermemory corruption. In order to trigger the vulnerability, a victim must betricked into visiting a malicious webpage.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
